name: TOTR BETA 1
description: Robots have declared their independance from humans and consequently take over the human city. The city advances technologically because of the robots. The robots frequently fight each other for control of territory. They do this in a stadium, in different locations. They also have to face unexpected challenges caused by unusual weather patterns as a result of the increased Co2 production. Story modes will come out featuring a robot's journey from a soldier to the leader of the largest territory in the world. There will be sandbox modes for experimental play and different gamemodes. Early Access Beta only includes lines 1-6. The others will be released in later editions to come.
